title: How to Remove a Comment on YouTube: Delete & Report Tips

steps.title: Open the YouTube app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open the YouTube app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. If you don't have the YouTube app, you can manage your comments using the website on a mobile or desktop browser. Make sure you're logged into the account that made the comments.

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. You can find this at the bottom-right corner. Your profile page will open.

steps.title: Tap the cog icon.
steps.content: Tap the cog icon. This is in the top-right corner. The Settings menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Your data in YouTube.
steps.content: Tap Your data in YouTube . This is below the Account header. A new window will open with your Google activity.

steps.title: Tap the X comments button.
steps.content: Tap the X comments button. This is the second option in "Your YouTube dashboard". You may need to swipe to see this option.

steps.title: Tap the video link.
steps.content: Tap the video link. This will be next to your comment. You'll be redirected to the video with the comment.

steps.title: Select ⋮.
steps.content: Select ⋮ . It's on the right side of the comment. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Select Delete or Remove.
steps.content: Select Delete or Remove . You'll see Delete if you're removing your own comment from a video, or Remove if you're removing another user's comment from your own video. A popup will appear asking to confirm.

steps.title: Tap Delete or Remove again to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Delete or Remove again to confirm. The comment will be removed.

steps.title: Go to your Comment History.
steps.content: Go to your Comment History . This is the direct link to your comment history. If prompted, enter your login information for your YouTube account. You can use a desktop or mobile browser. [1] X Research source You can delete your own comments from any YouTube video. If you want to delete someone else's comment, you must be the creator of the video. Otherwise, you can report the comment . If you're a creator and you want to delete someone else's comment, navigate to the video with the comment.

steps.title: Click the video link.
steps.content: Click the video link. This will be next to your comment. You'll be redirected to the video with the comment. Alternatively, you can search for the video by entering its name in the search bar at the top.

steps.title: Select ⋮.
steps.content: Select ⋮ . It's on the right side of the comment. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Select Delete or Remove.
steps.content: Select Delete or Remove . You'll see Delete if you're removing your own comment from a video, or Remove if you're removing another user's comment from your own video. The comment will be removed. On mobile, you'll need to tap DELETE or REMOVE again when prompted.

steps.title: Go to the comment you want to report.
steps.content: Go to the comment you want to report. If you find a comment you believe violates YouTube's guidelines, you can report it to YouTube . If they find the comment to be problematic, they will delete it from the video. You can search for a video by entering its name in the YouTube search bar. If you're on mobile, tap the magnifying glass icon first.

steps.title: Select ⋮.
steps.content: Select ⋮ . It's on the right of the comment you wish to remove. A pop-up menu will appear.

steps.title: Select Report.
steps.content: Select Report . A pop-up menu will open with additional options for reporting the comment.

steps.title: Select an option.
steps.content: Select an option. Make sure the option you select accurately portrays the comment since you don't want to falsely flag the comment. You have the following options: Sexual content Violent or repulsive content Hateful or abusive content Harassment or bullying Harmful or dangerous acts Misinformation Child abuse Promotes terrorism Spam or misleading

steps.title: Select Report.
steps.content: Select Report . It's at the bottom of the pop-up window. Doing so will report the comment to YouTube and hide it from your view. Other people will still be able to see the comment until it is deleted by the video's owner or by YouTube.

steps.title: There's no built-in way to delete every comment you've posted.
steps.content: There's no built-in way to delete every comment you've posted. You'll need to manually delete them from YouTube one by one. However, there may be a workaround: Some users have reported that hiding your channel for a long time (the time varies) can delete your comments and replies. If you want to give this a try, here's what to do: To hide your channel, do the following: Sign in to YouTube Studio . Go to Settings > Channel > Advanced Settings . Select Remove YouTube Content at the bottom. Select I want to hide my channel . Check the boxes for everything you want hidden. Select Hide my channel . Unfortunately, nobody seems to know how long your channel will need to remain hidden before the comments are deleted.

steps.title: Where is my comment history on YouTube?
steps.content: Where is my comment history on YouTube? You can find your comment history in the YouTube mobile app by navigating to your profile, selecting the cog icon, and then selecting Manage all history . Tap Interactions , and then Comments & replies . To quickly find your comment history on any device, visit the Comment History page .

steps.title: Can you take comments off YouTube?
steps.content: Can you take comments off YouTube? If you're the creator of the video, you can choose to add comment moderation, pause comments, or disable comments entirely. If you posted a comment on someone else's video, you can easily delete it. You can manage your comment settings in YouTube Studio in Settings > Community Moderation > Defaults . [2] X Research source If you want to delete a comment that isn't yours and you aren't the creator, you can report it.

steps.title: Can YouTubers see deleted comments?
steps.content: Can YouTubers see deleted comments? YouTube users cannot see comments once they are deleted. However, the comment may take a few hours to be fully removed.

steps.title: Can I delete my comment on someone else's post?
steps.content: Can I delete my comment on someone else's post? You can delete your comment on someone else's video. Just navigate to the comment, select the three-dots icon, and then select Delete .
